texts.en: A short film shot in the game Star Citizen. A Carrack filled with cargo departures from Lorville as usual. However, this trip may not be as normal as before for the only three crew members on the ship... Credits: DIRECTOR, CAMERA, & SOUND DESIGN: Lapernum; WRITER: Lapernum, GrakePCH, & Seel; EDITOR: Lapernum, GrakePCH; CAST: Lapuernum, GrakePCH, Seel, & Yuer; MUSIC: Rachel Portman - Bailey, Lapernum - Carrack: Exodus OST1, Roger Subirana - Between worlds
texts.zh: 一个在星际公民游戏内完成拍摄的微电影。一艘克拉克满载着货物从罗威尔起飞，一切似乎如常，但此次旅程对于飞船上仅有的三名乘员来说有些不同……导演、摄影、声音设计：拉邦那；编剧：拉邦那、GrakePCH、Seel；分镜、剪辑：拉邦那、GrakePCH；参演：拉邦那、GrakePCH、Seel、Yuer；使用音乐：Rachel Portman - Bailey, 拉邦那 - Carrack: Exodus OST1, Roger Subirana - Between worlds
